page.title: 12Village Attitudes
page.content: One old lady we visted had strong views about today's life, such as : children have too much pocket money, Â£1 doesn't mean anything now.She's also disgusted at the way some teachers dress and also she doesn't think there's any religion these days. A lady who works at the post office in Purleigh doesn't like the new block of houses which stands behind the shop.Also another lady was ashamed of the council houses. One person wished there was still a chapel which was knocked down ten years ago. Many people commented that one of the main improvements that could be made would be to install main drainage as there are several houses without this basic facility.
